content:
Cargo can't yet build for aarch64 (openssl hasn't accepted the patch yet), so I'm trying to skip it in CI. I had this configure (with many things in the middle, making this less obvious):

./configure --enable-full-tools --tools=rls,clippy,rustfmt,analysis,src

Seems like that should generate an error.
Hm, perhaps. We're generally not good at detecting errors in configuration
